categories: Category:Articles that are known by a nickname

nodes.text: "Shrap" was the nickname of a Special Commando Advanced Recon Trooper in Task Force 99, a squad within the Galactic Empire's Stormtrooper Corps. Shrap served as the squad's heavy weapons specialist, wielding a flamethrower and explosive charges. Shrap participated in Task Force 99's mission to the Ghost Moon in order to kill a group of Rebels hiding there.
